title: What About a Bloodborne Director's Cut? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.08.21
description:
Greg and Tim take the Dark Souls 3 60FPS on Xbox news and follow it to its logical conclusion: Bloodborne Director's Cut on PS5. Wait, what?

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:09:10 - Housekeeping
State of Play TODAY! 2 pm PT
THE KF PODCAST REUNION: youtube.com/kindafunny
Mario Golf with Game Attack: youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:10:11 - Dark Souls 3 Now Runs At 60 FPS On Xbox Series X|S, But Resolution Is Still Locked to 900p, Darryn Bonthuys @ GameSpot
00:24:00 - DICE LA Rebrands, Kat Bailey @ IGN
00:32:00 - Ad
00:34:10 - CD Projeckt Red Vancouver is a GO!, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:39:50 - RE Village Sales, via Nibel
00:45:30 - Out today
00:50:50 - Squad Up:Devan(Xbox Series and PlayStation 5) - VerumDex on Xbox and PaopuTrio on PlayStation
00:51:33 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Blessing
